Variants

Class DoubleBonus

  • Object
    • DoubleBonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Variants

    public class DoubleBonus
extends Object
implements Variants
    Class DoubleBonus implements the Class Variants and it represents the Double Bonus 10/7 variant of Video Poker.

    This variant contains a specific payback table according to the possible winning hands defined.

      Returns the value of a hand according to the bet value.
      static int getPosCard(Card[] hand, int cardValue, int cardSuit)

      • getPosCard

        public static int getPosCard(Card[] hand,
                             int cardValue,
                             int cardSuit)
        Returns the position in the hand array (1..5) of a card with a specific value (0..12) and a specific suit (0..3).
        Parameters:
        hand - a Card array.
        cardValue - an integer in the range 0..12
        cardSuit - an integer in the range 0..3
        Returns:
        position in the hand array (1,..,5) of a specific card or -1 if the card was not found.
